biography: Amissa Brewer-Hofmann is a fourth-year medical student at Columbia University, based in New York City. She has a background in painting and the visual arts and aims to blend her love of painting with medicine and patient care. Specifically, she is interested in how patients with chronic conditions are able to express their experiences. She hopes to help patients tell a story about how they are feeling -- physically, mentally, and emotionally -- through visual art.
